alert.note: Alert for Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 4:04PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Lisbon affecting Ransom County. .Anticipated precipitation over the next few days will cause rises on area rivers to exceed minor flood stage. Crest are subject to change as additional forecast precipitation is accounted for within the river forecasts. Current river forecasts account for forecast precipitation through 7 am CDT Saturday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Lisbon. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Some rural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday and continue rising to 16.0 feet Friday. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
